CustomField.description: this checks the box on whether this is something only the deal management team should see.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Non_Quotable__c = TRUE, NOT($Profile.Name = 'System Administrator'), NOT($Profile.Name = 'Deal Ops Administrator'), NOT($Profile.Name = 'Grafana System Admin Lite') ), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: this checks the box on whether this is something only the deal management team should see.
CustomField.label: Deal Management Only
